column4: this is what annoys me. I have a bad feeling not only do i have a better pc than most the community; my pc is better than most the developers. that makes it hard to choose this os
i just want things to work
or answers to make em work
what makes your computer so hot?
you said it was better...so whats the issue?
specifically....? i have a really nice computer too, but most of it preconfigures
i dont know what your problem is exactly, i jumped in when you said your pc was better than most developers
do you have a specific issue?
so what exactly are you trying to figure out?
try "decon" when spelling, i didn't notice your last one
have you installed the restricted drivers for your nvidia yet?
interesting, so what exactly is it telling you?
hmm, what are the SPECIFIC problems?
is it a software issue within the game?
and have you tried switching to the beta drivers? or other nvidia drivers?
have you configured your xorg.conf properly to support your monitor/video card?
you might look into the betas
